title: unban experiment by riot?
body: i heard that riot is testing unbanning perma banned accounts in NA servers wondering if this is true or false :) would b nice to get my account back in the future :)

replies.body: I would love for my original account to be unbanned. 100% reformed btw. I only run it down afk every 3 or 4 games.

If I remember correctly, that experiment occurred earlier in the year, and showed the same results it always does; there's just nowhere near enough players who genuinely reform to reasonably support such a system, with about 99% of players returning to the behaviours that originally got them banned.
Maybe but this is Oce, not NA.
